sentences.sContent: Observe microorganism in the water and in the sediment by a microscope.
sentences.sContent_eng: Observe microorganism in the water and in the sediment by a microscope.
sentences.sCn: 用显微镜观察水样本和基质样本中的微生物。

sentences.sContent: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of microorganism elimination by routine purified technology of water plants in Shenzhen.
sentences.sContent_eng: Objective To investigate the effectiveness of microorganism elimination by routine purified technology of water plants in Shenzhen.
sentences.sCn: 目的调查分析深圳区镇水厂常规水处理工艺去除微生物的净化效果。

sentences.sContent: In order to improve the microorganism fermentation process of producing glutamine, an electrodialysis method was developed to separate glutamic acid and glutamine.
sentences.sContent_eng: In order to improve the microorganism fermentation process of producing glutamine, an electrodialysis method was developed to separate glutamic acid and glutamine.
sentences.sCn: 为改进微生物发酵法生产谷氨酰胺的流程，提出用电渗析方法来分离谷氨酰胺和谷氨酸。

phrases.pCn: 病原微生物；致病微生物

remMethod.val: micro(小) + organism( 生物) → 微生物

trans.tranOther: a living thing that is so small that it cannot be seen without a  microscope
